content.title: Secure your account with two-factor authentication
content.firstParagraph: To enhance the security of your account, we require two-factor authentication for access. Here is your 2FA code:
content.thirdParagraph: Please enter this code in the login prompt to access your account.
content.footer: If you didn't request this email, you can safely ignore it.
